flawed_nl_solution:
She gets 1000/25=<<1000/25=40>>40 sections
She gives away 40/4=<<40/4=10>>10 sections
So she keeps 40-10=<<40-10=32>>32 sections
She keeps 32/2=<<32/2=16>>16 sections on hand
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 32. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
